issue.title: Splitwise Clone
issue.body:
## Overview
Build an expense-sharing app where friends track shared expenses and settle debts.

## Features
- Google OAuth + email/password auth
- Create groups, invite members
- Add expenses, split equally
- Real-time balance calculations
- Settle up functionality
- Live updates with Socket.io

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Lucide React icons
- SQLite with better-sqlite3
- NextAuth.js
- Socket.io

## Design
- Clean minimal design, mobile-first
- Use shadcn/ui: Card, Button, Input, Avatar, Dialog

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail, Create group
